GSP33bbdip12u:713: tato bahvannaṃ bhavatvityālocya sa mṛtyuḥ 'tayā vācā';
GSP33bbdip12u:726: nanvapsaṃvatsasṛṣṭyādinātrocyamānenāpi kathamasya viṣṇuprakaraṇatvaniścaya ityato 'psaṃvatsarasṛṣṭyāderviṣṇuliṅgatvāditi bhāvena tasya talliṅgatve smṛtimāha - nehāsīditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:745: 'tatra'; aṇḍe saṃvatsarākhyaṃ brahmāṇamasṛjadityanvayaḥ nāmetyanena samyagvatsabhūtān ramayatīti vyutpattyā saṃvatsaraśabdaścaturmukhe prasiddha ityucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:757: sṛṣṭaṃ taddharaye 'rpitavāniti śeṣeṇa yojanā brahmavaivarta ityanantaraṃ yata uktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:762: ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33bbdip12u:763: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca trināciketāḥ (kaṭha. 1-3-1.)
GSP33bbdip12u:765: atrādhikaraṇe lokato 'nyatra prasiddhakarmaphalabhoktṛtvaliṅgasya viṣṇau samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:776: sarvāttṛtvamadhye praviṣṭaṃ tadviśeṣabhūtaṃ pātṛtvaṃ yatroktaṃ tatra kāṭhake 'ṛtaṃ pibantau';
GSP33bbdip12u:781: iha tu karmabandhavidhure paramātmani prakṛtyarthasya nirbhede pratyayārthasya cāyogānna
GSP33bbdip12u:786: viṣayavākye janyajanakabhāvaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ tathā ca 'sukṛtasya loke';
GSP33bbdip12u:787: sukṛtanirmite puṇyakārye tattvapradīparītyā sukṛtanimitte śarīre hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau guhāyāmapi 'parame';
GSP33bbdip12u:788: sarvajīvottame ā ṛddha ārdhaḥ parebhyo rudrādibhya ārdhaḥ parārdhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:790: tathā ca tatra praviṣṭau hṛdayaguhāśritavāyvadhiṣṭhānāviti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip12u:793: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tathā dharmaḥ sukṛtaṃ cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:794: ṛtaṃ tu mānaso dharmaḥ ....... iti gītābhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛteḥ śāstravihitakarmabhirāgataṃ phalamupalakṣaṇayā ṛtamityucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:799: 'sa eṣa yajñaḥ pañcavidho 'gnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśuḥ somaḥ'; ()
GSP33bbdip12u:802: naciketā nāma ṛṣiḥ naciketasa idaṃ nāciketamagnicayanaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:803: trināciketāstrivāramanuṣṭhitanāciketeṣṭakācayanavanto ye vartante viduṣāṃ pāpināṃ ca krameṇa 'chāyātapau';
GSP33bbdip12u:809: iti vākye pibantau yau pratīyete tau kāvityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:810: anena pibantau kiṃ jīvaparau uta pararūpe eveti saṃśayaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:811: itītyanantaraṃ iti saṃśaye jīvasahitar iśvaraḥ pāteti pūrvapakṣe ca satīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:823: tathā ca - yāvātmānau ṛtaṃ pibantau tāvātmānau viṣṇurūpe eva /
GSP33bbdip12u:826: viṣṇū iti vaktavye viṣṇurūpe evetyuktiḥ dvivacanasya rūpadvayavivakṣayā sāvakāśatoktyarthā /
GSP33bbdip12u:829: nanu viṣṇossarvaśarīreṣvekaikarūpeṇaiva praveśātkathaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇāpi dvivacanopapattirityataḥ taddarśanāditi sūtrāṃśasūcitaśrutimudāharati - gharmeti //
GSP33bbdip12u:839: deśataḥ kālataḥ śaktitaśca sampūrṇau yau bhagavantau trivṛtaṃ tejobannātmakaṃ śarīraṃ 'vyāpatuḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:850: gurvarthadīpikāyāṃ tu samantāditi padacchedaṃ kṛtvā vidyamānāviti cādhyāhṛtya samantādvidyamānau vyāptāviti vyākhyātam/
GSP33bbdip12u:856: ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudramāviveśa sa idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vicaṣṭe /
GSP33bbdip12u:857: taṃ pākena manasāpaśyamantitastaṃ mātā relhi sa u relhi mātaram //
GSP33bbdip12u:858: suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhirekaṃ santaṃ bahudhā kalpayanti / (ṛ. 10-114-4., 5.)
GSP33bbdip12u:875: tathā ca - ekasminnapi viṣṇau yuktaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇa dvivacanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:876: evaṃ taddarśanāt ityetat tattvapradīparītyā uktaviśeṣaṇe nirṇīte viṣṇau dvivacanadarśanāt 'ekaḥ suparṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:877: ityādinā tacchabdenaikavacanena parāmarśadarśanāt tasyaiva samudraniveśino nikhilabhuvanadarśinaḥ 'apaśyamantitaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:880: niviṣṭo hṛdaye nityaṃ rasaṃ pibati karmajam //
GSP33bbdip12u:882: nanu viṣṇau rūpadvayavivakṣayā pratyayārthopapattāvapi prātipadikārthakarmaphalabhoktṛtvāyogāt na 'ṛtam';
GSP33bbdip12u:884: eka eva hariḥ dehajīvarūpopādhibhedāt ātmāntarātmeti rūpabhedena 'dvidhā sthito';
GSP33bbdip12u:887: yaddhā - ṭīkārītyā upādhibhedavivakṣāmantareṇaiva dvirūpatayā dehaniviṣṭaḥ 'karmajaṃ rasaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:898: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:901: śubhaṃ pibatyasau nityaṃ nāśubhaṃ sa hariḥ pibet /
GSP33bbdip12u:902: pūrṇānandamayasyāsya ceṣṭā na jñāyate kvacit // iti pādme //
GSP33bbdip12u:917: pūrṇānandasya sukhabhogāyoga iti dvitīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ pariharati - pūrṇānandamayasyeti /
GSP33bbdip12u:922: aiśvaryaṃ kvacitkāle deśe kenāpi sākalyena 'na jñāyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:924: tathā ca - aiśvaryabalena pūrṇānandasyāpi sukhabhogo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:942: tathā ca - na śrutiyuktivirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:946: tasya jīve 'pi yogādityata āha - yo vedeti /
GSP33bbdip12u:952: tathā ca ityādinā viṣṇoreva prasiddhaṃ guhānihitatvamatra grāhyamiti imamarthaṃ sūtrakāro hiśabdena darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:953: tathā ca - hṛdayaguhāsthatvamātrasya jīve sambhave 'pi na tadiha hetutvena gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:962: kutaḥ? hi yasmāttau hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau tasmāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:963: na hi jīve 'pi guhāniviṣṭatvaliṅgaṃ sambhavatīti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:969: na ca rūpapraveśena dvirūpeṇa praveśasyāsiddhatvādityāśaṅkyāha - taddarśanāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:972: atra tattvityasyānuvṛtyā śrautapadānuvṛttyā ca ānandamayastadbrahmetyādivadihāpi pratijñāsiddheḥ ātmānāvityuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:974: smṛtisamākhyāṃ śrautapadānuvṛttiṃ vinā ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā śubhakarmaphalabhoktṛtvarūpaliṅgaṃ ca vaktum /
GSP33bbdip12u:975: uktaṃ hi candrikāyām - ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā ātmaśabdoktaṃ śubhabhoktṛtvaṃ mūlayuktiriti /
GSP33bbdip12u:978: tathā - yadyapi samanvetavyamṛtapātṛtvaṃ sākṣādeva vaktavyamiti tadvākyāntarasyāpyādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattimantareṇāntaryāmītivat ṛtaṃ pibantāviti spaṣṭaśabdenaiva vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:982: tathā teṣāmeva samanvayasūtrāttadityatrāpyanuvartate iti candrikāvirodhoktirapi cintyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:986: na ca tadityanuktau tuśabdasyānvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate iti samanvayādhikaraṇīyasudhāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:992: evaṃ yadā niravakāśaguhānihitatvaliṅgasya sāvakāśāddvivacanaśrutito 'pi prābalyādviṣṇoḥ prakṛtyarthabhoktṛtvasambhavācca sa eva pāteti siddhyati
GSP33bbdip12u:993: kimu punarniravakāśaśrutyāpītyarthaṃ pratipādayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadabhipretaśrutimevodāharati - viśeṣaṇācceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:998: iti śrutau pibatorekavacanabodhyenaikatvena viśeṣaṇādeka eva pātā /
GSP33bbdip12u:999: sa ca yajamānasetutvabrahmatvākṣaratvādinā viśeṣaṇāt brahmaṇaśca paratvena viśeṣaṇādviṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip12u:1006: taṃ dhyātuṃ naciketasaṃ prati sādhanaṃ vaktuṃ 'śakemahi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1011: amitā hi guṇā yasmānnānyeṣāṃ tamṛte prabhum / iti brāhme /
GSP33bbdip12u:1018: jñātavyāśca sarvairadhikāribhiḥ sarve guṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1020: jñānaṃ bhavet ataḥ sarvaguṇajñānārthaṃ tasmin viṣṇau brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyate iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1021: yato brahmaśabdena sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33bbdip12u:1024: yasmādvibhuṃ taṃ viṣṇumṛte anyeṣāṃ jīvānāṃ nāmitā guṇāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1030: atra paraiḥ pibantau buddhijīvāviti pūrvapakṣe prāpte jīveśvarāveveti vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1034: hetau, svavyānena saha paravyākhyānanirākaraṇasya samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ tathā cāsaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1035: satya ātmā satyo jīvaḥ satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā
GSP33bbdip12u:1045: kecidbhedamasatyamāhuḥ tatkathametadityatasteṣāṃ pakṣe śrutirabhīkṣṇaṃ dūṣaṇamabhidhatte - maiveti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1047: āsamantādaraśīlā vā āravaḥ tairasatyabhedajñānibhiḥ viṣṇuḥ sarvathā vanyo bhajanīyo netyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1049: asya nāsatyo bheda ityuttareṇānvayaḥ evaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutirityasyāpi /
GSP33bbdip12u:1050: atra yadyapi bhāgavatatātparye - 'satyatvaṃ ca bhedasyoktaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutau /
GSP33bbdip12u:1051: sthāṇurheccakrāma sa prajāpatimuvāca ko 'si ke smaḥ kaḥ saḥ iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1052: sahovāca yo 'smi ye stha yaḥ sa iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1053: athainamupākrośat satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā';
GSP33bbdip12u:1064: tātparyodāhṛtā tu anyā tatsamākhyā rūpā cetyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1076: 'saḥ'; viṣṇuryādṛśo mayā bhavadādibhiśca bhinnastādṛśa eveti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1080: evameva hi me vācaṃ satyāṃ kartumihārhasi //
GSP33bbdip12u:1107: dvitīye tu viṣayānatikrameṇa bhedasatyatvajñānasya trāṇakāraṇatvoktyā bheda satyatvamapi jñāyata iti prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1109: tathāhi - dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:1110: daivo vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu //
GSP33bbdip12u:1117: ta āsurāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ jagataḥ kṣayakāriṇaḥ //
GSP33bbdip12u:1119: indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ujjataṃ nyarpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1129: triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ tayetvṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti / (ṛ. 10-87-11.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1130: vācā stenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ / (ṛ. 10-87-15.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1131: atha jñānopasargāḥ ityārabhya yecānye mithyātarkairdṛṣṭāntaiḥ kuhakendrajālairvaidikeṣu paristhātumicchanti taiḥ saha na saṃvaset /
GSP33bbdip12u:1133: ityādiśrutiśatairandhaṃ tama eva māyināṃ gatiriti niścīyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1137: sarve yānti tamo ghoraṃ na teṣāṃ utthitiḥ kvacit // iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1145: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ ca darśayati - āditya iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1157: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi sa evāhamasmīti ca vākyadvaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1161: pūrvapakṣe gārhapatyasyaiva akṣisthatvasādhanena gārhapatyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ tasyāsādhanāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1165: evaṃ gārhaptayasyāpi ādityasthatvamucyate iti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ gārhapatyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1167: yuktipradarśanārthaṃ vā tadupādānamiti na vaiyarthyamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1174: prakṛtasya ata ityanena parāmṛṣṭāsyādityāntaḥ sthatvasya aikye hetutvāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1178: tathā ca - yadānandamayākhyaviṣṇuniṣṭhatayoktamādityasthatvaṃ tacchāndogye 'ya eṣa āditye puruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1183: tataḥ kim? yato 'tra gārhapatyākhyāgnerevādityasthatvamucyate 'to 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:1187: tathā ca pūrvapakṣaśrutigatāhaṃśabdo agnāveva mukhya iti tasyaiva grahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1191: yadvā - 'aśanayodāhṛtādityastrivṛdiva vai cakṣuḥ śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kanīnikā'; ()
GSP33bbdip12u:1193: tathā ca - ādityasthatvoktyā arthādakṣisthatvamapi prāptameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1200: ata eva bhāṣye sannyāyaratnāvalyāṃ ca akṣyādityayoraikyādityevoktam,
GSP33bbdip12u:1202: akṣyādityayorekavidhatvāditi ṭīkāpi bhāṣyānusāreṇa prakārabhedaniṣedhamukhena prakāryaikyaparā neyeti pakṣāntaramapyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1205: maṇḍalaparatve tadbhāṣyasthādityapadaṃ pūrvodāhṛtataittirīyaśrutisthādityapadaṃ ca maṇḍalaparatayā vyākhyeyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1216: iti vākyadvārā ekārthatvamupapādya tanmukhena 'ya eṣa āditye';
GSP33bbdip12u:1218: iti vākyasya saṅgatiṃ sampādya taddvārārthākṣiptatadarthārthakasya 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1219: iti vākyasyāpi tena saṅgatirityevaṃ vakrasaṅgatyaitadadhikaraṇārambhaḥ ādityasthatvaliṅgasyāpi samanvayasiddhyartham /
GSP33bbdip12u:1224: ityuktākṣisthajñānātpratīyata iti vakṣyamāṇaṛjusaṅgatyaiva adhikaraṇamārambhaṇīyaṃ syāditi dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1225: ataḥ 'tadyathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate'; (chāṃ. 4-14.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1230: tadapi bādhitaṃ syādityata āha - ata iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1235: tathā ca yato 'gnirakṣistho 'tastajjñānādeva mokṣo 'pi bhavet na viṣṇujñānāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1239: na ca tajjñānātsarvapāpāśleṣamātreṇa kathaṃ mokṣa iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1240: yatastajjñānānmokṣaṃ vinā sarvapāpāśleṣāsambhavena tadanyathānupapattyaiva mokṣasyāpyupapattiriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1246: kamalāyanasyāpatyaṃ kāmalāyanaḥ nāmataḥ upakosalaḥ satyakāmākhye gurau brahmacaryamuddiśyovāsa /
GSP33bbdip12u:1249: punaḥ punaḥ svajāyayokto 'pi anuktvaiva vidyāṃ pravāsāya prātiṣṭhata /
GSP33bbdip12u:1250: tadopakosalo vyādhipīḍito vidyāprāpticintayā svācāryabhāryayā aśānetyukto 'pi nāśnāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1251: evaṃ brahmacāriṇyanaśnati tūṣṇīṃbhūte sati tadā gārhapatyādyagnayaḥ kāruṇyāviṣṭāḥ trayo 'pi vayamasmai brahmacāriṇo vidyāṃ prabravāmeti pratijñāya militāssanto vidyāmūcuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1252: 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'; ityādi /
GSP33bbdip12u:1253: evaṃ sambhūyopadeśānantaramenaṃ pratyekam agnaya upadidiśuḥ ityucyate vedapuruṣeṇa
GSP33bbdip12u:1254: 'atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa ...... ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi
GSP33bbdip12u:1256: evaṃ tribhiragnibhiḥ pratyekamupadiṣṭa upakosalaḥ athāsmābhiruktaṃ jñeyameva,
GSP33bbdip12u:1261: kimiti? yadagnibhistubhyamupadiṣṭaṃ tattvayā jñeyameva na tūpāsyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1262: tattvamahamupadekṣye ityevaṃ pratijñāyādarajananāya vakṣyamāṇamastaut 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃkarma na śliṣyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1264: kimiti? 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GSP33bbdip12u:1269: asya so 'hamasmītyasya dvikartukatvādgārhapatyādyantaryāmī bhagavān svasyādityādyantaryāmiṇā gārhapatyādiḥ svāntaryāmiṇaḥ ādityādyantaryāmiṇā aikyamāhetyucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1271: āditye ca eṣa puruṣaḥ pūrṇaṣaḍguṇo bhagavān dṛśyate divyadṛṣṭyā so 'smītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1274: evamupāsakasya phalamāha - 'sa etadevaṃ vidvānupāste 'pahate pāpakṛtyāṃ lokī bhavati sarvamāyureti jyogjīvatīti'; /
GSP33bbdip12u:1286: vakṣyamāṇākṣisthatvena brahmāparokṣajñānini jñānottaraṃ pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1287: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇyantaḥpuruṣo dṛśyate divyadṛṣṭyā eṣa ātmā vāmanākhya iti hovāca upakosalaṃ prati satyakāmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1302: cakṣurantaḥstha ityanena antara ityaṃśo viṣṇurevetyanena anuvṛttastattvityaṃśaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1303: yadyapi anuvyākhyāne śabdavaiyarthyaparihārāya antassthitvā ramaṇakṛditi vyākhyānāt atrāpi tadanusāreṇa ramaṇakṛcceti vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1304: tathāpyatra ramaṇakriyābodhakātmaśabdasya hetukaraṇānna tadarthasya pratijñāyāmanvayaḥ sambhavatīti antastha ityevoktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1305: tatratvātmaśabdārthasya hetutvāvivakṣāṇātsādhyānvayo na yujyata iti ramaṇakṛdityapyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1306: vastutastu - sūtre antarityanuktyā antara ityadhikokteḥ sārthakyāya atrāpi ramaṇakṛccetyapi upalakṣaṇayā vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1307: avayavārthavivakṣāvivakṣābhyām ātmaśabdasya sādhyasamarpakatāhetutvaṃ ca yujyate iti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1310: upapatterityetadanekaliṅgaparatayā liṅgānāṃ niravakāśatvoktiparatayā ca vyāṣṭe - tripāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:1319: tathā ca - tripādityādinā śrutyantaravākyena tasya viṣṇoreva uktasya 'etadamṛtam';
GSP33bbdip12u:1320: iti vākye 'ntaḥsthaniṣṭhatvenoktasyāmṛtatvādyupapatterliṅgasya tasmin viṣṇāveva upapatteryuktatvādanyatrāyuktatvāditi yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1325: saṃsārasya pārasthaṃ taduttarāvadhibhūte śvetadvīpādau sthitaṃ muktaprāpyaṃ paraṃ brahma tat dhyātuṃ sādhanaṃ vaktuṃ vayaṃ 'śakemahi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1329: kimu tadobhayathā svabhāvaniravakāśatvābhyām anekatvācca balavacchrutito 'pīti bhāvena
GSP33bbdip12u:1337: guṇapūrtivācibrahmaśabdasya viṣṇāveva mukhyatvādātmaśabdasyāpi ādeyamupādeyaṃ sukhaṃ mātyanubhavatīti vyutpattyā tatraiva mukhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1339: iti śrutyukto 'ntaraḥ tattu tattajjīvaprerakatvena tattaccakṣurantassthito viṣṇureva, na tvagniḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1345: nanu niravakāśaśrutiliṅgabalādyadi viṣṇureva akṣisthastadādityastho 'pi sa eva syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1352: sarve śabdāḥ prayujyante sati bhede 'pi vastuṣu /
GSP33bbdip12u:1361: katham? yato 'ntaryāmiṇamapekṣyaivaite śabdāḥ prayujyante naitāvatā agnyādijīvānārṃ iśābhedaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1367: 'tadyadasmin sarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati'; (chāṃ. 4-15.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1386: etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti .... eṣa u eva vāmanireṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1387: eṣa u eva bhāmanireṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti';
GSP33bbdip12u:1391: anena sautrādiśabdo hyadhiṣṭhātṛparamātmaparassan tacchaktyupalakṣaka iti vyākhyāto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1398: siñcetkaścidapi tarhi tadvartmanī ubhayamārgau pratyeva gacchati na cakṣuḥ spṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1399: evaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vāmanākhyaṃ viṣṇuṃ saṃyadvāma ityācakṣate vidvāṃśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1402: anena saṃyanti vāmāni enamiti vigraho darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1409: puruṣeṣu bhāti tadīyatejaḥprakāśakatayā tatra dīpyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1410: yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - vāmaṃ saundaryaṃ bhāmaṃ tejaḥ tatpradhānatvāt strīpuruṣā vāmabhāmaśabditāstannetā vāmanirbhāmaniśceti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1411: etalliṅgadvayasadbhāve 'pi kuto 'kṣisthasya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - tasyeti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1415: asādhāraṇo dharmaḥ tasmānnāprayojakatvamiti tena viṣṇutvaniścayopapattiriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1416: 'sar iśaḥ so 'sapatnaḥ sa hariḥ saḥ paraḥ sa parovarīyān
GSP33bbdip12u:1417: yadidaṃ cakṣuṣi sarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati sa vāmanaḥ sa bhāmanaḥ na ānandaḥ so 'cyutaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1419: kuta etasya talliṅgamiti jñāyate ityata āha - sa iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1428: tathā ca - yadyasmātsannihitādhiṣṭhātuḥ yasya sāmarthyāditi yāvat /
GSP33bbdip12u:1430: asmiṃścakṣuṣi sarpirudakaṃ vā siñcati cetkaścit tarhi tadvartmanī pratyeva gacchati sar iśaḥ 'so 'sapatnaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1435: rudrādeḥ parato vāṇyāḥ parāccaturmukhātparataḥ śrītattvādva uttamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1443: sa vāmanaḥ paro 'smākaṃ gatirityeva cintayet // iti vāmane // 14 //
GSP33bbdip12u:1444: liṅgasvarūpasya tasya viṣṇurūpavyaktiviśeṣaniṣṭhatāyāśca śrutāvasphuṭatvāttadarthamatrārthe smṛtiṃ cāha - yaditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:1465: ityantasya sūtreṇānvayaḥ upakrame prāṇasya śrutatve 'pi naitatprakaraṇasya tatparatvam,
GSP33bbdip12u:1475: atra prakaraṇe hi mukhyaprāṇobrahmākhilajīvebhyaḥ pūrṇaḥ iti mukhyaprāṇasya pūrṇatvamuktvā 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1485: yadaivamupakrame kaṃ brahma iti pūrṇasukhābhidhānādevāsya prakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvaṃ siddhyati kimuta tadā 'khaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1492: tathāpi tadbrahmaśabdasya parāparayo rūḍhyā vṛttyā vyākhyānāntaramityadoṣaḥ/
GSP33bbdip12u:1497: nanu upakrame pūrṇasukhasaṃvidorabhidhāne 'pi kuto 'sya prakaraṇasya vaiṣṇavatvamityāśaṅkya
GSP33bbdip12u:1498: tayosatallakṣaṇatvāt tadrūpatvāt upakrame tadabhidhāne brahmaivopakrāntaṃ syāditi
GSP33bbdip12u:1513: tathā ca - śrutyantare brahmalakṣaṇatvenāvagatayoḥ pūrṇajñānasukhayoratra prakaraṇe 'bhidhānāt asya vaiṣṇavatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1523: anyeṣāṃ tvāpekṣikameva pūrṇaṃ sukhaṃ na viṣṇuvanniravadhikaṃ pūrṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1535: nanvagyādisukhasyāpekṣikatayāpi pūrṇatvasadbhāvātteṣāṃ pūrṇasukhamidaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1536: tathā teṣāṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1537: tathā teṣāmevedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ kiṃ na syāt ityata āha - na ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1548: iti vidyāṃ coktvāgnibhirupakosalaṃ prati 'upakosalaiṣā somya te 'smadvidhā cātmavidyā coktā';
GSP33bbdip12u:1567: tasmādagniviṣayatvameva cakṣurantaḥsthavidyāyā ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - śruteti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1576: tathā ca - śrutopaniṣadāṃ śrutamatadhyātaitadvidyānāṃ puṃsāṃ kena vāyunā kagateḥ 'kaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:1583: iti śrutopaniṣatkānāṃ śrutopaniṣadgatopāsanānāṃ brahmagatyabhidhānācca āntaro viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip12u:1586: śrutaviṣayiṇī yā upaniṣat matidhyānarūpopāsanā tatkānāṃ tadgataṃ tadviṣayakaṃ dhyānarūpopāsanaṃ tadvatāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1588: brahmetyanena bahuvrīhisamāsāvayavabhūtaḥ kaśabda āvṛtto brahmavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1593: yadyapyasya sūtrasya prakaraṇavicchedaśaṅkāparihārāyopasaṃhārasthaliṅgoktiparatvaṃna paramasādhye yuktyantarapratipādakatvābhāvādatra caśabdo na prayojyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1602: saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarādādityamāditiyāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo mānavaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1608: 'yadi ca na'; yadi vā na kurvanti 'tadārciṣam';
GSP33bbdip12u:1609: arcirnāmakadevalokaṃ sambhavanti prāpnuvantyeveme jñānina iti vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1623: svamāptān pratīkālambanān caturmukhākhyaṃ kāryaṃ brahmāpratīkālambanāṃstu paraṃ brahma gamayatīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1626: tathāpi kuto nāgniviṣayatvamasyā ityata āha - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1630: hiśabdena vipakṣe - 'devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti māmapi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1640: evamupapattyādibhirviṣṇorakṣisthatvaṃ pratipādya vipakṣe bādhakenāpi tatsamarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhati - anavasthiteriti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1643: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa itaro jīva iti hetusādhyayojanāmabhipretya atra vipakṣe 'niṣṭaprasaṅgābhidhāyakatayānavasthiterityaṃśaṃ yojayati - jīvasyeti
GSP33bbdip12u:1648: itara ityasyāgnirityarthe vācye jīva iti sāmānyenoktiḥ sādhyahetvostantreṇābhidhānārtham /
GSP33bbdip12u:1651: kutaḥ? yataḥ sa itaro jīvaḥ jīvatvāditi yāvat /
GSP33bbdip12u:1653: jīvasya jīvāntaraniyāmakatve prerakatve āntarajīvasyāpi jīvatvasāmyatāttasyāpi niyāmakaṃ jīvāntaraṃ vācyamityanavasthiterasiddhaparamparākalpanarūpānavasthākhyāniṣṭāpatteḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:1657: agnerjīvasya preryajīvāntareṇa saha paratantrarūpajīvatvasāmyāditi sūtravṛttirdarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1662: na caivaṃ jīvāntarasyāpi svātantryaṃ syāt jīvatvasāmyādityuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1663: jīvatvasāmye 'pyagnereva svātantryaṃ nānyeṣāmiti niyamābhyupagamādityata āha - niyameti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1673: evaṃ vā - nanu paratantratvasāmye 'pi jīvānāṃ jīvāntaraniyāmakatvātkathaṃ tadasambhava ityata āha - anīśvareti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1675: tathā ca - yathāsmatpakṣe sati rājñi maṇḍaleśe prajānāṃ rājaśaktyā niyamyaniyāmakabhāvavart iśvaraśaktyā jīvānāṃ jīvāntaraniyāmakatvasambhavaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1680: uktaṃ hi tattvapradīpe - niyamapramāṇābhāvo 'nīśvarāpekṣatvaṃ cetyubhau ubhayatra heturiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1684: 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya
GSP33bbdip12u:1685: pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1700: bṛhadāraṇyake uddālakaṃ prati yājñyavalkyenoktaṃ idaṃ vākyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1702: pṛthuṃ viṣṇumūḍhvā vāti gacchatīti pṛthivī garuḍaḥ tasmin tiṣṭhan 'pṛthivyāḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1724: etena antaro vivikta iti ṭīkāyā bṛhadbhāṣyavirodho nirastaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1743: tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1749: tathā ca so 'ntaryāmī jaḍacetanobhayarūpā prakṛtiḥ pṛthivyāditattajjīvo vā yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1752: citprakṛteśca sarvābhimānitvena sarvātmakatvāt pṛthivyādijīvasya pṛthivyādisarvaśarīratvāditi yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1754: nanu yathā prakṛtyādiliṅgena teṣāmantaryāmitvaṃ tathā amṛtatvaliṅgena viṣṇostatkiṃ na syādityata āha - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1760: tathā ca - saiddhāntikaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvapakṣaliṅgasya niravakāśatayā balavattvādanena tasya bādhānnāntaryāmī viṣṇuriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1771: tatra yadyapi sautravyapadeśapadena abhipretaṃ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati';
GSP33bbdip12u:1788: sūtre bhāṣye cādhidaivetyuktyā pṛthivyādīnāṃ jaḍatvena tadaviditatvaṃ sarvasyāpi sambhavatīti śaṅkā vāritā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1799: tasya viṣṇoḥ dharmasya aviditatvāntaratvādeḥ 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda';
GSP33bbdip12u:1801: sa hi 'na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jātaḥ'; (ṛ. 7-99-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1805: aviditatvādeḥ kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1809: ityupakramya 'yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaraḥ sañcaran yaṃ pṛthivī na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā apahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1814: 'na te'; iti vākyaṃ ca te devamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ mahimānaṃ śrotrādinā nāpa iti prakṛtānuguṇyena sarvatrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1820: evaṃ niravakāśaliṅgena viṣṇorantaryāmitvaṃ samarthya yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā prakṛtyāderantaryāmitvaṃ tatprakṛtijīvasādhāraṇaṃ yuktyā nirākurvatsūtramupanyasyati - na ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1824: ata eva avyayamityāśayenāniyamābhiprāyeṇādau hetuvākyaṃ vyākhyāti - triguṇatvādīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1831: sādhyadharmapratiyoginirdeśāya pūrvapakṣe yuktisūcanāya ca prayuktaṃ smārtamityedvyācaṣṭe - smṛtyuktamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1837: antaryāmiṇo 'nyarūpatvaniṣedhāya pravṛtte sūtre 'pekṣitaṃ sādhyadharmiṇaṃ darśayati - antaryāmīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1839: na pradhānamantaryāmītyanena sautracaśabdaḥ antaryāmī viṣṇureva na tu pradhānamiti tuśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1840: sa ca na śārīra ityādāviva parapakṣaniṣedhamātraṃ na kriyate,
GSP33bbdip12u:1842: svapakṣavidhirapīti parapakṣaniṣedhasya svapakṣavidhipūrvakatvarūpaviśeṣārtha iti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1844: na tu smārtaṃ pṛthivyādyātmakatayā smṛtau pratipāditaṃ pradhānam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1848: tattvapradīpe tu - nañastadviruddhārthatvamāśrityātmatvāmṛtatvādṛṣṭatvadraṣṭṛtvādyataddharmābhilāpācca iti hetuvākyasya vṛttyantaramapi darśitam/
GSP33bbdip12u:1852: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmano 'ntaro yamātmāna veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:1854: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan vijñānādantaro yaṃ vijñānaṃ na veda yasya vijñānaṃ śarīram'; (bṛ. 5-7-22.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1857: tatsādhakābhāvena nirastamapi punarbādhakākhyaviśeṣayuktyā nirākurvatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - śārīra iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1859: ubhaye ityasya viśeṣyapadaṃ darśayati - śākhina iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1861: ātmano 'ntara iti mādhyandināḥ vijñānādantara iti kāṇvāḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1869: tattvapradīpe tu - citprakṛterapyatra pūrvapakṣaviṣayatāmāśritya śrībhūdurgārūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ 'yastejasi tiṣṭhan'; (bṛ. 5-7-14.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1876: śarīrābhimānī jīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1882: yadyapi bṛhadbhāṣye ātmādiśabdasya caturmukhākhyajīvaparatayā vyākhyātatvādidaṃ sūtraṃ jīvaviśeṣasya yogino 'ntaryāmitvanirāsakamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1884: tathāpi yadā sarvajīvābhimānicaturmukhādapi tanniyāmakatvādinā bhinno 'ntaryāmī tadā
GSP33bbdip12u:1888: ramate ca parohyasmin śarīraṃ tasya tajjagat /
GSP33bbdip12u:1893: kathaṃ pradhānadharmānuktiḥ pṛthivyādiśarīratvasyaiva taddharmatvādityata āha - śīryata iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1922: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayasaṅgativiṣayavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ ca sūcayati - adṛśyatvādīti/
GSP33bbdip12u:1934: nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ tadavyayaṃ tadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti
GSP33bbdip12u:1939: candrikāyāṃ tu - ityuktvā pratīyata iti bhāṣye kriyayoḥ samānakartṛkatvābhāve 'pi ktvāpratyayo 'yadorvaṃśaṃ naraḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:1943: tathocetthaṃ yojanā - pūrvaṃ ye adṛśyatvādiguṇā viṣṇoruktāste yatra kasyacidakṣarasyoktāstatrātharvaṇe 'dṛśyatvādiguṇakākṣaraviṣaye 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyam';
GSP33bbdip12u:1947: divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sa bāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1958: ityakṣaraśabdaśravaṇāttasya ca tatparatvoktyā viṣṇoḥ niravakāśatvāditi pūrvapakṣayuktiśca sūcitā bhavatīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1963: 'agotraṃ'; na vidyate gotrādikaṃ yasya taddhi tathocyate iti sudhoktervaśiṣṭhādigotrahīnam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1978: bhūtayonipadaṃ ca sattarkadīpāvalyāṃ bhūtānām ākāśādīnāṃ brahmādicetanānāṃ vā keṣāṃcit strīvyavadhānena vinā svasvadehādevotpādakamiti vyākhyātam
GSP33bbdip12u:1989: 'gṛhṇate'; cakrādyākāratayā bahirniṣkāsitaṃ vastu punarantaḥ svodare gṛhṇāti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1990: tathā viśvaṃ pralaye nigīrṇaṃ sṛṣṭau akṣarātsambhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1999: atra brahmaṇo bhūtakāraṇatvaṃ tatkartṛtvarūpaṃ na tūpādānatvamiti vaktumādyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2000: aṅkurādijanane pṛthivī bījamiva viśvasṛṣṭau brahma tatkarmāpekṣata iti vaktuṃ dvitīyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2014: itisaṅgatisambhavāt iti śaṅkāsadbhāvācca taduttararūpaṃ sūtramabravīdbādarāyaṇaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2019: nanvadṛśyatvādikaṃ viṣṇorna cet - tarhi vākyasya nirviṣayatayā aprāmāṇyaṃ syāt ityataḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ viśadayati - pṛthivyādīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2020: śrutāvūrṇanābhidṛṣṭāntasya prāthamye 'pi tatra sṛjata ityanena kartṛtvamātrapratīteḥ pūrvapakṣānukūlasyopādānatayā jagatkāraṇatvasyāpratīteḥ taṃ parityajya pṛthivyādītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2029: atrāyaṃ vivekaḥ - yadā jaḍaprakṛteḥ pūrvapakṣaviṣayatā tadākṣaraśabdastatparo hetuḥ tatparataḥ parābhidhānaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:2030: tasya niravakāśatve akṣarātparata iti ca vyadhikaraṇe pañcamyau /
GSP33bbdip12u:2039: brahmaśabdo viṣṇāveva mukhya iti tasyaiva sādhako netarasyetyato hetvantaramāha - parata iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2043: evaśabdena hetorniravakāśatvaṃ nātra hetvantaraṃ gaveṣaṇīyamiti sūcayati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2047: itīśaśabdaśravaṇāt rudrasya vā adṛśyatvādiprāptiriti vakṣyamāṇamatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2048: asmin pakṣer iśaśabdasya viṣṇau sāvakāśatvaśaṅkāyāmanantaraṃ tatparataḥ parābhidhānādityapi yojyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2052: atha dve vāva vidye veditavye parācaivāparā ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:2053: tatra ye vedā yānyaṅgāni yānyupāṅgāni yāni pratyaṅgāni sāparā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2054: atha parā yayā sa harirveditavyo yo 'sāvadṛśyo nirguṇaḥ paraḥ paramātmā ()
GSP33bbdip12u:2056: evaṃ prāptaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamevamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2063: tasya viṣṇordharmastaddharmaḥ tasya bhāvasatattvaṃ teneti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2071: tatra tadvattvaṃ brahmasvarūpamiti viśeṣaṃ vaktum adṛśyatvādayo guṇā yasyeti bahuvrīhitvaṃ ca sūcayituṃ śubhadharmārthakaguṇaśabdaprayogaḥ kapratyayaśca
GSP33bbdip12u:2073: kutaḥ? atra prakaraṇe 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate'; (muṃ. 1-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2077: na ca tasya paravidyāviṣayatvoktāvapi kuto viṣṇutvamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2081: iti śrutau mokṣasādhanajñānaviṣayatvoktyā viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2088: ityatrāpi viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamucyate iti na hetuviśeṣaṇāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2092: tathā ca parā cāparā ca dve vidye jñātavye /
GSP33bbdip12u:2103: svottamo vyāptaḥ sa hariryayā veditavyaḥ sā ṛgādirūpaiva pareti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2113: nirākṛtamapi viśeṣayuktyā nirākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - viśeṣaṇeti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2117: arthāt kintu viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyām iti samuccayārthatvasya spaṣṭatvānna tasyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2118: prakṛtiḥ viriñca ityanena itarā itaraśceti vigrahāśrayeṇetaraśabdārtho 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2125: iti vākye viriñcasya tasmādakṣarājjanyatvarūpabhedakadharmoktyā bhedavyapadeśānnādṛśyatvādiguṇo viriñca iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2144: tattvapradīpe tu - vidasattāyāmiti dhātuvyākhyānāt sarvatra vidyate iti sarvavidityuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2150: śrīḥ parā prakṛtiḥ proktā cetanā viṣṇusaṃśrayā //
GSP33bbdip12u:2153: iti skānde tryakṣarābhidhānādakṣarātparataḥ para ityapi viśeṣaṇameva /
GSP33bbdip12u:2155: parataḥ parābhidhānenākṣaraśruteḥ tatra niravakāśatvādityato viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśāditi sūtrakhaṇḍasyārthāntaramāha - aparamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2163: proktaṃ vṛddhaistāṃ tat yā viṣṇusaṃśrayā parā uttamā cetanā prakṛtiḥ śrīḥ lakṣmīḥ tāṃ prāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2164: yatparataḥ paramakṣaramīritaṃ tajjaḍaprakṛteḥ parāchrītattvādakhilaguṇaṃ harimeva prāhuriti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2169: 'aparam'; iti skānde tryakṣarābhidhānāt akṣarāntarātparādasyākṣarasya paratvopapatteriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2170: akṣaratrayābhidhānena akṣarātparataḥ para ityatra sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā anvayo darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2171: prameyadīpe tu - akṣarācchrītatvātparataḥ paro 'tyuttama iti tadbhāṣyadiśā śrutyartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2177: ityakṣarāṇāmavāntarabhedokteḥ pāṇḍavasyārjunasya svādhamakārtavīryārjunādiva akṣarātparādakṣarāntarādasyākṣarasya paratvopapattiriti sūtrakhaṇḍasyārthāntaramuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2180: nanu 'anyam'; itiśabdaśravaṇādadṛśyatvādiguṇako rudraḥ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkottaratayāpi bhedavyapadeśānnetara iti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - juṣṭamiti
GSP33bbdip12u:2190: iti vākye pravṛttaviṣṇvākhyākṣarasyeśaśabditarudrādanyatvavyapadeśādapi nādṛśyatvādiguṇako rudra iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2195: 'yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim'; (muṃ. 3-1-3.) iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2196: yuktyantareṇa viṣṇorevādṛśyatvādiguṇakatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - rūpopanyāseti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2202: atra yadeti vākyasya 'tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'; (muṃ. 3-1-3.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2214: jñānottaravikarmakṛtāśucitvādidoṣarahitaḥ añjanākhyāvidyārahita iti sudhokterajñānarahito vā 'paramaṃ sāmyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2217: tattvodyotaṭīkāyāṃ tu iyaṃ śrutiḥ muktaparatayā vyākhyātā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2219: 'eko nārāyaṇa āsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2222: tata ete vyajāyanta viśvo hiraṇyagarbho 'gniryamo varuṇarudrendrā iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2223: tasya haitasya paramasya nārāyaṇasya catvāri rūpāṇi śuklaṃ raktaṃ raukmaṃ kṛṣṇamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2226: nanu brahmādīnāmapi rūpasadbhāvātkuto rūpopanyāsenāsya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - eka iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2231: tathā ca idamasya jagato 'gre pralaye nārāyaṇaḥ 'ekaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2254: mānuṣādau viśeṣeṇa miśrīcakāra yadvā - sa etāni rūpāṇi vyamiśrayat,
GSP33bbdip12u:2262: ato miśrīkaraṇāt tadrūpaṃ tasya viṣṇo rūpam 'etādṛgeva';
GSP33bbdip12u:2279: iti sūrye pratītamapi miśrameveti liṅgasyānyatra niravakāśatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2298: abhito vigataṃ mānaṃ maryādā yasya taṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2309: agnāviṣṇvoḥ sādhāraṇasya vaiśvānaraśabdasya viṣṇāveva prasiddhātmaśabdena viśeṣaṇādvaiśvānaro viṣṇureva // 24 //
GSP33bbdip12u:2317: vaiśvānaraśruteḥ viṣṇau prasiddhyabhāvena tatra niravakāśatvātpūrvoktasarvagatatvasyāpi viṣṇoranyatra niravakāśatvāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2318: tathā ca - yadyapi agnāviṣṇvoḥ pratijñāviṣayayoḥ satoḥ pūrvapakṣasādhakavaiśvānaraśabdo niravakāśatvena prakāreṇottarapakṣasādhakaliṅgasādhāraṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip12u:2319: śrutiliṅgayorniravakāśatvena sāmye 'pi liṅgācchrutiḥ prabalā tasmādagnireveti prāptam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2320: tathāpi sādhāraṇasyāpi vaiśvānaraśabdasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatayā śrutyādisiddhena 'ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram';
GSP33bbdip12u:2330: atra pakṣe sādhāraṇyaṃ prati dharmitvaṃ śabdasyaiva,
GSP33bbdip12u:2342: kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ samākhyarūpahetvantareṇa vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:2354: nanvahamiti viṣṇunā kṛṣṇenokteḥ smṛtyuktavaiśvānarasya viṣṇutve 'pi atroktavaiśvānarasya kuto viṣṇutvamityata āha - samākhyānāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:2357: samākhyāyuktirna sūtroktetyata āha - iti śabda iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2359: tathā ca - itismaryamāṇamityasya itisamākhyāyamānamityarthābhyupagamāditiśabdaḥ samānoktirūpasamākhyālakṣaṇaliṅgajñāpaka iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2362: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānānneti cenna tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśādasambhavātpuruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate / BBs_1,2.26 /
GSP33bbdip12u:2374: vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvamākṣipya samādadhatsūtramupanyasya ākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - śabdādibhya iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2376: iti bṛhadāraṇyakavākyam 'mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyāṃ vaiśvānarama-ta ājātamagnim /
GSP33bbdip12u:2377: kaviṃ saṃrājamatithiṃ janānāmāsannā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ //'; (ṛ. 6-7-1.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2380: tathā ca ityādirūpaḥ śabdaḥ sautraśabdapadenokta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2404: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ pradhānaliṅgatvādidaṃ pṛthaguktamityabhipretya talliṅgaṃ tatkarmoktyā darśayati pācakatveneti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2406: anena sūtre 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānapadena na kevalaṃ tattaddhṛdayāntaravasthānamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2415: tasmādubhayatra śrutyādisāmyādvaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti niścayo na yujyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2417: iti vicāryavākye vaiśvānaraśabdasamānādhikṛtāgniśabdābhāvādvākyāntaragatāgniśabdasya kathaṃ śaṅkāhetutvamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip12u:2420: yadvā - pūrvapakṣe 'pi siddhānta iva samākhyāṃ pradarśayituṃ samākhyārūpeṇa tattadvākyoddhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2421: ayamiti vākye 'yamityuktaḥ ka ityata āha - yo 'yamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2425: tadvyāpāramāha - yeneti idaṃ kimityata āha - yadidamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2430: ṛtāyeti vedāntare pāṭhādṛci ṛta iti saptamī tādarthye /
GSP33bbdip12u:2431: tathā ca divaḥ kāraṇabhūtamūrdhānaṃ loke gamanenāratidarśanāt rativiruddhagatisādhanatvādgauṇyā vṛttyā 'aramalamatati gacchati yena puruṣaḥ so 'ratiḥ pādaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2432: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ mukhyayā vṛttyā aratiḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2433: ṛgatāvityasmātkaraṇe atipratyaye niṣpanno 'ratiśabdaḥ pāde mukhya evetyapi kecit /
GSP33bbdip12u:2437: tathā ca - pṛthivyāḥ aratiṃ kāraṇībhūtapādaṃ janānām āṛte samyagjñānāya 'jātam';
GSP33bbdip12u:2448: aṅganetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ prasiddhaṃ ca devā āsan /
GSP33bbdip12u:2454: tattvapradīpe tu - viśvanarastham ṛte vede 'ā samantājjātaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2463: ato 'nekārthatvāddhātūnāṃ viṣṇujanye 'gnau devajanyatvāyogāt janerutpattyarthāyogācca akurvannityuktamiti āṅviśleṣeṇaiva ṭīkā vyākhyeyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2466: iti vākyārthastu - 'tasmāduhaivaṃ vidyadyapi caṇḍālayocchiṣṭaṃ prayacchedātmani haivāsya vaiśvānare hutaṃ syāt'; (chāṃ. 5-24-4.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2470: tadā taddattamucchiṣṭaṃ caṇḍālāntaryāmiṇi vaiśvānare hutaṃ syānna pāpakaraṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2476: dakṣiṇāgniranvāhārya odano 'tra pacyata iti vyutpatti sambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2485: anenāgnau hūyamānadravyasyāgniḥ pācaka iti siddhamiti pācakatvākhyaliṅgamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2492: na, 'atha hemamātmānamaṇoraṇīyāṃsaṃ parataḥ paraṃ viśvaṃ harimupāsīteti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2493: sarvanāmā sarvakarmā sarvaliṅgaḥ sarvaguṇaḥ sarvakāmaḥ sarvadharmaḥ sarvarūpa iti'; /
GSP33bbdip12u:2502: kuto 'gnyādināmakarmaṇāṃ viṣṇāveva sāvakāśatvaṃ jñāyata ityatastatra hetusamarpakaṃ 'tathādṛṣṭyupadeśāt';
GSP33bbdip12u:2521: etadicchayaiva sarvaṃ bhavatīti sarvakāmaḥ pūrṇakāma ityupāsīta /
GSP33bbdip12u:2524: sarvatra rūpamasya iti vā sarvaṃ jagadasya rūpaṃ pratimeti vā sarvarūpa ityupāsīta /
GSP33bbdip12u:2525: 'sa ya etamevamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ harimārādaramupāste tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu deveṣu sarveṣu vedeṣu kāmacāro bhavati';
GSP33bbdip12u:2528: 'saḥ'; prasiddhaḥ yo 'dhikārī etamātmānam aṇoraṇīyāṃsaṃ parataḥparameva viśvaṃ harimeva,
GSP33bbdip12u:2531: alaṃ samyagupāste tasyaivamavyāpte vyāptarūpopāsakasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu 'bhūteṣu';
GSP33bbdip12u:2532: prāṇiṣu sarveṣu lokeṣu sthiteṣu bhūteṣviti vā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2534: vedeṣu yatheṣṭasañcāraḥ kāmasañcaraṇasarvapūjyatvasarvajñatvādiḥ syāt ityarthaḥ tattvapradīpe 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2546: abrahmāṇaḥ pare sarve brahmātmā viṣṇureva hi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2549: evamanyaśrutiliṅgadīnāṃ viṣṇau sāvakāśatvopapādakatayā tathetyaṃśaṃ vyākhyāya ātmaśabdāderanyatra
GSP33bbdip12u:2551: yojanātu - ityādinā pramāṇena viṣṇoranyeṣām ātmatvabrahmatvāsambhavokteḥ ata eva ātmaśabdāderanyatrāsambhavāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2553: kintu prakaraṇabalācca vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatītyāha - anāttatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2556: tathācetthaṃ yojanā - 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:2562: anena sūtre ārambhāditi padamadhyāhṛtya tenāpiśabdaḥ saṃyojyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2569: kintu pradhānenaiveti jñāpanāya viṣṇureva vaiśvānara iti punaruktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2578: chāndogye hi 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:2579: iti militvā mīmāṃsamānaiḥ pratyabdayajñakṛttvanimittānmahāśālasaṃjñaiḥ pañcabhirmahāmunibhiḥ uddālakoddiṣṭaistadyuktaiḥ paripṛṣṭo rājāśvapatirvaiśvānaramupadideśa
GSP33bbdip12u:2586: ityādinā yaḥ puruṣākhyo viṣṇubhihitastadvidhamevātra 'mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmā'; (chāṃ. 5-18-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2597: ityādikaṃ dvitīyādipadena 'sandoho bahulo vastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau'; (chāṃ. 5-18-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2602: ityādinā śabdena yaḥ puruṣākhyo viṣṇuḥ yadvidho dyubhvādijanakaśīrṣādimānabhihitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2604: ityādinā vākyenainaṃ vaiśvānaramadhīyate chandogāḥ tasmātpuruṣasūktasamākhyayāpi vaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2606: nanu puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatve bhavettatsamākhyayā etadvidyāyā viṣṇuparatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2612: ātmaśabdasmṛtisamākhyāprakaraṇasamuccayasyeva prakaraṇaśrutisamuccayasyāpi apipadenaiva siddhatvānna tatropakṣīṇaścaśabda iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33bbdip12u:2615: tathaiva me mano nityaṃ bhūyādviṣṇuparāyaṇam // iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2616: kiṃ tadvedādītyataśśruteḥ sākṣātpratijñātārthāsādhakatvātpratijñākramamatikramya sākṣātpratijñātārthasādhakatvādādau purāṇavākyaṃ paṭhati - tathā ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2617: sūtre puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti yathoktaṃ tathā brāhme coktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2625: iti śabdānvayaḥ siddhārthasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvādanena brāhmavacanena vivakṣitārtho jñāyate //
GSP33bbdip12u:2627: iti eṣa hyaivācintyaḥ paraḥ paramo harirādiranādirananto 'nantaśīrṣo 'nantākṣo 'nantabāhuranantaguṇo 'nantarūpa iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2628: pratijñātāṃ śrutiṃ darśayituṃ prathamameva tatsthānamāha - caturvedaśikhāyāṃ ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2633: ityukto harireva nānya ityetatsūktaṃ viṣṇuparatayā vyākhyātīti prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2655: na tathā sarvavedāśca vedāṅgāni ca nārada // ityādi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2658: sākṣātpratijñātārthasādhakaṃ smṛtivākyaṃ tatsthānanirdeśapūrvakaṃ paṭhati - bṛhatsaṃhitāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2675: yadyapi nātra chāndogye vedābheda ucyate iti na tadgatirvaktavyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2683: tathā ca yasmādyasmāt hareraṅgāt yadyat lokavedādikaṃ jāyate,
GSP33bbdip12u:2686: tasya lokāderyannāma vācakaśabdaḥ tena mukhyavācyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2693: ata eva tadabhinnatvena pratīyate ca sāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2709: viśvāni rūpāṇi viṣayatvena yasyeti vigrahāśrayeṇa sarvarūpātidarśanāt cakṣurviśvarūpākhyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2710: evaṃ viṣṇoḥ prāṇo nṛsiṃhākhyo vāyvādiprāṇaśakyaṃ yanna bhavati tasya pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthagvilakṣaṇo mārgo yasya sa cāsāvātmā ceti,
GSP33bbdip12u:2715: agnyādiśruteḥ gārhapatyādyaṅgavatvādiliṅgācca pācakatvenāntaḥpratiṣṭhānācca vaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti niścayo na yujyata iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip12u:2730: kintu yataḥ puruṣasūkte puruṣo yadvidho 'bhihitaḥ tadvidhamevainaṃ viṣṇuṃ 'mūrdhaiva';
GSP33bbdip12u:2732: ataḥ śrutisamākhyānādapi caśabdaḥ puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ bahupramāṇasiddhamiti dyotayatīti sūtravṛttirdarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2734: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.27 /
GSP33bbdip12u:2736: agnivaiśvānarādiśabdastejasi bhūte agnidevatāyāṃ ca prasiddho 'pyataḥ pūrvoktahetuta evātra na sā taccābhidhīyate // 27 //
GSP33bbdip12u:2737: nanu vaiśvānaraśabdasya devatābhūtayoḥ prasiddhatvādatrāpyasau tatparaḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasyati - ata eveti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2738: atra caśabdasya samuccayārthatvaṃ yadyapi tathāpītyarthatvaṃ cāśritya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - agnīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2763: nāgnyādayaḥ śabdā agnyādivācakāstathāpi sākṣādevānanyayogena brahmavācakaiśśabdaiḥ vyavahārārthamanabhijñānācca anyatra vyavaharantītyabhyupagame 'virodhaṃ jaiminirvakti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2764: nanu loke vede ca agnyādipadānārm iśādanyatra vyavahāraprasiddhidarśanāt tasya ca kāraṇāntarābhāvāttadanyathānupapattyānyeṣāṃ vāṭcvamaṅgīkāryam
GSP33bbdip12u:2765: anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - sākṣāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:2768: agniśabda eva ādiryeṣāṃ te 'gnyādaya iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2779: caśabdo na kevalaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ kintvanabhijñānācceti samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip12u:2780: 'anyatra'; agnyādiṣu tān tatra vyavaharanti jñānino 'jñāninaśceti krameṇa śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2791: kutaḥ? yato vācyārthadhīvyavahitaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ vinā sākṣānmukhyavṛttyāpi brahmavācakānagnyādiśabdān
GSP33bbdip12u:2794: prasiddhivilopābhāvaṃ vaktyasya iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati //
GSP33bbdip12u:2798: nanu jaiminyādimatānāṃ bhagavanmatāvirodhitve jaiminyādigrahaṇavaiyarthyāt tadvirodhitve vā kathaṃ viruddharāddhāntena parihāra ityata āha - vyāseti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2803: svasvamatyā viviktāni tāni matāni idaṃ madīyaṃ idaṃ madīyaṃ ityūrīkṛtyānye vyavaharanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2804: yathā gṛhanagarādibhirākāśapradeśānavacchidyāyaṃ madīyaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ madīyaḥ pradeśa iti janāḥ vyavaharantīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2806: tathā ca jaiminyādimatānāṃ vyāsamatena parasparaṃ cāvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2824: anenāpi - tattatsūktādau brahmaṇa eva pratipādyatve 'pi agnivāyvādīnāmapratipādyatve 'pi avirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2825: agnyādisūktaniyamaḥ idamagnisūktam idaṃ vāyusūktam iti sūktaniyamaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2827: kathaṃ? tairagnyādisūktādibhistasya brahmaṇastasyāmupāstau kṛtāyāṃ tatrāgnyādiṣveva tasya brahmaṇaḥ 'abhi';
GSP33bbdip12u:2828: svecchayābhivyaktiniyamāttadabhiprāyeṇa tatprasiddherupapatterityevaṃ vaidikāgnyādisūktādiprasiddhyavirodhamāśmarathyācāryo vaktīti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati //
GSP33bbdip12u:2847: jaiminimatasya pūrvamupanyastatvātkimarthaṃ punarvacanamiti mandāśaṅkānirāsāya ubhayānvayīti śabdaparāmṛṣṭapūrvoktānuvādena viṣayabhedaṃ darśayan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sākṣāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:2855: nanvagnyādiṣu bhagavadupāstau agnyādiprāptirbhavatītyetatkuta ityataḥ sūtrasūcitāṃ śrutimudāharati - tamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2856: 'taṃ'; paramātmānaṃ yena yena prakāreṇa upāsate adhikāriṇaḥ tena prakāreṇa tadeva rūpaṃ 'bhavati';
GSP33bbdip12u:2863: anena yato 'gnyādisūktādiṣu mukhyataḥ parabrahmaṇa eva pratipādyatve 'pyavirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2881: yadyapi ṛgbhāṣye - pṛthagrūpāṇi viṣṇostu devātāntaragāṇi tu /
GSP33bbdip12u:2891: na hyanyopāsako 'nyaṃ prāpnuta iti yujyata ityata āha -
GSP33bbdip12u:2900: ityādau tadanabhyupagamācceti bhāvenāśaṅkya tatparihāratayā sūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2911: tattvapradīpe tu - na kevalamekatraivāmananti paṭhanti vājasaneyāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2939: agnyādau āmananti śrutayo 'ta iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
